title: Energy Storage Asset Valuation
description: An investment analyst needs to determine the valuation of a standalone battery storage asset based on its potential future revenues.

tasks.description: Forecast the asset's potential revenue streams for the next 10 years, including energy arbitrage and ancillary services.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed annual revenue forecast.

tasks.description: Model the asset's operational costs, including battery degradation and maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a forecast of annual operational expenditures.

tasks.description: Perform a discounted cash flow (DCF) analysis to calculate the Net Present Value (NPV) of the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a final valuation for the battery storage system.
